暵字的基本解释

暵
hàn
干枯。
干旱：“帅而舞旱暵之事。”
晒，炕：“大小麦皆须五月六月暵地。”

暵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hàn］
［《廣韻》呼旰切，去翰，曉。］
［《廣韻》呼旱切，上旱，曉。］
(1)萎缩；干枯。
(2)干旱。
(3)热。
(4)曝晒。

暵字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暵； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页499第31
【唐韻】呼旱切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】許旱切，?音罕。【說文】乾也。《易》曰：燥萬物者，莫暵乎火。○按《易·繫辭》今作熯。【博雅】曝也。【玉篇】熱氣也。【詩·王風】暵其乾矣。【傳】暵，菸貌。【釋文】水濡而乾也。【朱傳】暵，熯也。　又【廣韻】呼旰切，音漢。義同。

dry
Basic explanation of words
dry
hàn
Withered.
Drought: "Being handsome and dancing about drought and dredging."
Sun, Kang: "All the big wheat must be dredged in May and June."
dry
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hàn］
["Guangyun" Hu Jiqie, go to Han, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" calls for drought to cut, up to drought, dawn. ]
(1) Atrophy; withered.
(2) Drought.
(3) Hot.
(4) Exposure.
dry

[Tang Yun] Hu dry cutting [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Xu dry cutting,? The sound is rare. [Said Wen] Do it. "Yi" said: Those who dry everything, don't let the fire. ○ Press "Yi·Xi Ci" to make seals today. [Bo Ya] Expose too. [Jade articles] Hot air. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】Get dry. [Biography] Jun, smoke appearance. 【Explanation】Water rushes and dries. [Zhu Chuan] Jun, seal also.　[Guang Yun] Hu Jinqie, Yin Han. The same meaning.
